title: Giro D’Italia Women: 4 Stages That Will Decide the 2024 Race
content:
RCS revealed the route of the rebranded Giro d'Italia Women earlier this week, with a big opening TT and a summit finish on the Blockhaus.

Read the full article at Giro D’Italia Women: 4 Stages That Will Decide the 2024 Race on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
